name: CUBAD: The Sequel
description:
Cubad The Sequel is a free to play platformer game where you jump across platforms while avoiding obstacles and enemies on your way to get the crown of your king stolen by a mysterious creature.

Join an epic adventure of Cubad the champion of cubic kingdom whose King has turned into a statue.  Go through a fun filled adventure to return the crown to your king.

This game currently has 8 levels with 2 boss levels and I have planned to add as many levels in the future.

#platformer #puzzle #bossfight #tough
